sentences.english: Mengsk approached the smaller man and stood before him, an intimidating presence.

sentences.english: Many believe that is posturing on Buck's part but Arsenal are digging their heels in.

sentences.english: A school of spotted eagle rays glides gracefully through the island-speckled waters of the Maldives.

sentences.english: And in West Africa, the gesture is even more insulting than the upraised middle finger.
